text: The Cadillac CT4 is a compact Sedan made by Cadillac. It replaced the Cadillac ATS sedan and is smaller than the CT5 in Cadillacâ€™s lineup. The CT4-V, a high- performance version, was introduced on May 30, 2019, and the regular CT4 followed in September 2019. The CT4 is built in the United States at the Lansing Grand River Assembly plant and in China at the SAIC-GM Jinqiao plant. == CT4-V == The CT4-V is a sportier version of the CT4, unveiled in May 2019. It has a 2.7-liter turbocharged four-cylinder engine, producing 325 horsepower and 380 lb-ft of torque. The CT4-V offers higher performance compared to the standard CT4. == CT4-V Blackwing == The CT4-V Blackwing is a more powerful version of the CT4-V, replacing the ATS-V. It is equipped with a 3.6-liter twin-turbo V6 engine, producing 472 horsepower and 445 lb-ft of torque. The CT4-V Blackwing can accelerate from 0 to 60 mph in as little as 3.9 seconds. This model is available with a 6-speed manual transmission or a 10-speed automatic. == Markets == The Cadillac CT4 is sold mainly in North America but its also sold in The Middle East South Korea and China. == References == Category:Sedans Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles CT4
title: Cadillac CT4
